{{Disambig}}

'''Earth''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Skin ===
* [[Earth Skin]] – a skin designed after ''Minecraft Earth''.

=== Joke ===
* {{EnvLink|Earth (April Fools')|Earth}} – a celestial body that appears in the joke update [[Java Edition 23w13a or b|23w13a_or_b]], in [[The Moon]] dimension.

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
* {{MCE}} –  the game itself and a free-to-play augmented reality spin-off mobile game that was discontinued due to the {{w|COVID-19 pandemic}}.

== ''A Minecraft Movie'' ==
* {{MovieLink|Earth Portal}} – a portal that allows characters to enter the {{AMCM|Overworld}} from Earth.
* {{MovieLink|Earth}} – the real world.
* {{MovieLink|Earth Cube}} – an artifact which opens the Earth Portal.
* {{MovieLink|Earth Crystal}} – an artifact needed for the Earth Cube to work.

== Events ==
* ''[[MINECON Earth]]'' –  online livestreams held at the official ''[[MINECON]]'' website in 2017 and 2018.
